bibl.title: Heracles and the Hone: About a Foundation Deposit from the Temple of Thonis-Heracleion.
bibl.note: Description of the objects. - Sites of the foundation deposits. - Functions and significance of foundation deposits. - An original collection. Heracles and the Hone. - Avec résumés en anglais et en arabe.
